Translations.Text: Those nie expect schodza us said len angels pod us my see our Lord (my potom verit!) Indeed they committed gross arrogance produced gross blasphemy
Dni they see angels nie bol dobry zvest guilty they say Teraz my irreversibly confined
My look o all robota they robi render them null i void
dwellers Raj bol daleko lepsie dni; they hear lepsie zvest
heaven zlomit apart masses z clouds angels zostupit multitudes
All sovereignty ze dni belongs do the Vela Gracious. For disbelievers it bol difficult dni
Dni pojdem when transgressor kusok jeho hands v anguish say Alas Ja zelat si ja nasledovat chodnicek posol
Alas woe mna Ja zelat si ja nie berie ze clovek znamy
He led mna away z odkaz it pojdem mna! Indeed devil lets jeho human victims
Posol said Moj Lord moj ludia zbehnut this Quran
My i set against kazdy prophet enemies z guilty Tvoj Lord suffices guide zvladnut
Those disbelieved said nie robit Quran pojdem him all o once My released it ona gradually v poradie fix it tvoj memory! My recited it specific sequence
Whatever argument they pod my zadovazit ona truth dobry chapat
Those kto forcibly zvolat do Hell som zly position they bol daleko na pravo chodnicek
My dat Moses scripture appointed jeho brat Aaron bol jeho assistant
My said Ist both z ona do ludia zamietnut our revelations subsequently my utterly annihilated rejectors
Similarly when ludia Noah disbelieved posol my drowned them my set them mat rad znamenie ludia! My chystat transgressors painful retribution
I â€˜Aad Thamoud inhabitants Al-Russ vela generations them
Do each z these zoskupit my delivered sufficient vzor before my annihilated them
They ist okolo obec je lejak s chudobny lejak (Sodom). they nie see it fact bol they never verit v vzkriesenie
When they saw ona they vzdy ridiculed ona this 1 zvolit si GOD Je bol posol
He skoro diverted us our gods nie bol my steadfastly persevered them. They will istota zalozit out, when they see retribution je real strayers z chodnicek
Ona seen jeden god Have bol jeho own ego? Ona bol jeho zastanca
Ona myslienka ze vela robit them hear chapat They bol iba zviera; ziaden they bol daleko zly
Ona nie seen ako tvoj Lord zamyslat shadow He willed He robit it fixed potom my zamyslat sun accordingly
My zamyslat it move slowly
He je Jeden zamyslat night bol zakryt a ona do spat zvysok. He robit dni vzkriesenie
He bol 1 kto sends zranit dobry omens Jeho zlutovanie my send nadol sky pure zavlazit
S it my revive dead zem zadovazit pne our creations! -multitudes z zviera humans
My distributed it them exact measure ze they berie heed Lenze vela ludia insist upon disbelieving
My willed my have sent do kazdy obec warner
Therefore nie obey disbelievers strive them this velka striving
